entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Belleville

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.2°C

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
